thread.title: PM faces revolt over refusal to pledge EU national rights
thread.title_full: PM faces revolt over refusal to pledge EU national rights

title: PM faces revolt over refusal to pledge EU national rights
text: Theresa May faces challenge over refusal to guarantee rights for EU nationals in Britain as MPs prepare to sign off Brexit Bill Brexit Bill is going through its final stages in the House of Commons today Government has so far defeated all efforts by MPs to amend the legislation Vote tonight on guaranteeing rights for EU citizens before third reading is given PM saw off rebellion last night by clarifying final Brexit package would be put to Commons before it is ratified by European Parliament
